description: This message appears when a user tries to add two or more files at once to the file upload widget.
defaultMessage: You can only upload one file here. Please try uploading one file.

description: This message appears when a user tries to add a file that the browser cannot read for some reason to the file upload widget.
defaultMessage: This is not a valid file. Please try again with a different file.

description: A label that appears when a user drags a file over a valid file drop area
A label that appears when a user drags a file over a valid file drop area. It ends with 'or' because it will be followed with a link that reads in English 'select a local file'.
Text for a link that when a user clicks it, it pulls up the file selector dialog for their local device operating system.
Tooltip message displayed on upload component. Cancel file selected for upload
